ReturnPolicy.Description:
If the sold item is not as described, it may be returned for a full refund (including shipping) when we are notified within 14 days of receipt. Return shipping will be arranged by Baum Galleries for all Domestic sales. Return shipping instructions for International sales will be provided by Baum Galleries at the time the return is authorized. Please contact us for authorization and instructions.

 If the sold item does not meet the buyer’s expectations, but is as described, the buyer may return the item for a 15% restocking fee of the selling price only when we are notified within 14 days of receipt. The buyer will be responsible for return shipping costs and the original shipping fees will not be refunded. 

All return items must be carefully packaged for transit in the same manner that they were originally received. All packages must have transit insurance equal to the selling price of the item and tracking unless otherwise authorized in writing by Baum Galleries prior to shipping.

Title: NEW VINTAGE MEN'S MOVADO KINGMATIC AUTOMATIC WATCH, WATER RESISTANT
SecondaryCategoryName: Jewelry & Watches:Watches, Parts & Accessories:Pocket Watches:Other Pocket Watches
Subtitle: ALL STAINLESS STEEL, COMES W/ BOX, MODEL  #- 84.D7.867
Description: Click to see supersized image NEW VINTAGE MEN'S, MOVADO KINGMATIC AUTOMATIC WATCH, WATER RESISTANT 200M, COMES W/ BOX, STAINLESS STEEL CASE, STAINLESS STEEL BRACELETE, MODEL #84.D7.867 Up for purchase is a men's Movado watch. As one can see from the photographs, this timepiece is in excellent condition aside from a few very minor handling scratches. We preserve our inventory in a secured climate controlled environment which allows elegant and dignified items such as this Movado to remain in pristine condition. One can utilize this watch to enhance a classy ensemble for a formal evening event or simply for casual everyday use. The watch has a rotating bezel function essential for divers as well as a 200M capacity for water resistance. The following will describe this item in further detail: WATCH INFORMATION Kingmatic, Automatic Movement Water Resistant 200M Rotating Bezel Original Stainless Steel Case & Original Brown Movado Leather Band Comes w/ Box Model #- 84.D7.867 Swiss Made CASE INFORMATION Stainless Steel Case & Crown Backing- Closed Display, Stainless Steel Case Diameter- 33MM w/o Crown Case Thickness- 10.5MM DIAL INFORMATION Round, Black Face Silver Tone Hands & Hour Markings Sapphire Crystal Date Display @ 3 O’clock All Numbers Displayed Except for 3 BRACELETE INFORMATION Original Stainless Steel Movado Bracelet Hidden Fold Over Deployment Clasp 7 Inches When Clasp is Closed Approximately Band Width 19mm AA-WM-226 All photographs displayed are apart of the item's description. Email us with any questions.
